Unpacking the First Day of Sam Bankman-Fried's Actual Trial https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2023/10/05/unpacking-the-first-day-of-sam-bankman-frieds-actual-trial/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=headlines 5XGGSWN27BEKTKSPFOZQBRIP34 Danny Nelson, Nikhilesh DeA Parisian cocoa trader told Sam Bankman-Fried’s trial jury that pricey ads and FTX’s confident CEO helped convince him the crypto exchange was a safe place to deposit over $100,000 so he could trade cryptocurrencies – but he never expected that anyone but him would touch his funds, kicking off testimony just hours after the jury was selected and sworn in.
